item.title: CVE-2022-40703|2024-08-03T12:21:46.771Z -- alivecor -- kardia%20app
item.description:
CWE-302 Authentication Bypass by Assumed-Immutable Data in AliveCor Kardia App versionÂ 5.17.1-754993421 and prior
on Android allows an unauthenticated attacker with physical access to the Android device containing the app to bypass application authentication and alter information in the app.
